exercises.welcome_message: Choose from various exercises designed to improve your mental well-being

box_breathing.title: Box Breathing
box_breathing.description: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4. Repeat.

478_breathing.title: 4-7-8 Breathing
478_breathing.description: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat to reduce anxiety.

diaphragmatic_breathing.title: Diaphragmatic Breathing
diaphragmatic_breathing.description: Deep belly breathing to activate the parasympathetic nervous system.

body_scan_meditation.title: Body Scan Meditation
body_scan_meditation.description: Progressive relaxation by focusing attention throughout the body.

loving_kindness_meditation.title: Loving-Kindness Meditation
loving_kindness_meditation.description: Develop feelings of goodwill, kindness and warmth towards others.

mindfulness_meditation.title: Mindfulness Meditation
mindfulness_meditation.description: Focus on the present moment, observing thoughts without judgment.

54321_technique.title: 5-4-3-2-1 Technique
54321_technique.description: Name 5 things you see, 4 you feel, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, and 1 you taste.

progressive_muscle_relaxation.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
progressive_muscle_relaxation.description: Tense and then release each muscle group from toes to head.

cold_water_technique.title: Cold Water Technique
cold_water_technique.description: Splash cold water on your face to activate the parasympathetic nervous system.

thought_record.title: Thought Record
thought_record.description: Identify and challenge negative thoughts with evidence.

positive_affirmations.title: Positive Affirmations
positive_affirmations.description: Practice repeating positive statements to build self-confidence.

gratitude_journaling.title: Gratitude Journaling
gratitude_journaling.description: Write down things you're grateful for to shift focus to the positive.
